Package com.mhealthatlas.taxonomy.repository

Interface AppVersionRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<AppVersion,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<AppVersion,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<AppVersion,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<AppVersion>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<AppVersion,​java.lang.Long>
public interface AppVersionRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<AppVersion,​java.lang.Long>
Contains methods to interact with the database.
The query annotations uses the entity classes defined in AppVersion. Standart actions like save and findAllById are automatically generated.

    Finds all not categorized application versions.

    Finds an application version by application id, application version id and app type

    • findAllCategorized

      @Query("Select distinct ap from AppVersion ap join ap.appTaxonomies at") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<AppVersion> findAllCategorized​(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageReq)
      Finds all categorized application versions.
      Parameters:
      pageReq - the paging parameter
      Returns:
      the found categorized application versions

    • findAllNotCategorized

      @Query("Select ap from AppVersion ap left join ap.appTaxonomies at where at is null") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<AppVersion> findAllNotCategorized​(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageReq)
      Finds all not categorized application versions.
      Parameters:
      pageReq - the paging parameter
      Returns:
      the found not categorized application versions

    • findByIdsAndType

      @Query("select av from AppVersion av where av.appVersionId = :app_version_id and av.appId = :app_id and av.appType = :app_type") java.util.Optional<AppVersion> findByIdsAndType​(@Param("app_version_id") java.lang.Integer appVersionId, @Param("app_id") java.lang.Integer appId, @Param("app_type") AppType appType)
      Finds an application version by application id, application version id and app type
      Parameters:
      appVersionId - the application version id
      appId - the application id
      appType - the application type
      Returns:
      the found application version;
      an empty Optional otherwise;

    • deleteByAppIdAndType

      @Modifying @Query("delete from AppVersion av where av.appId = :app_id and av.appType = :app_type") void deleteByAppIdAndType​(@Param("app_id") java.lang.Integer appId, @Param("app_type") AppType appType)
      Deletes application versions by application id and app type
      Parameters:
      appId - the application id
      appType - the application type
